entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
